text.p: In the year 1692 , his friend Charles Doe collected a number of his works in one large volume , in folio ; with a Life of Bunyan , and a chronological list of his various works , including those left in manuscript . This volume contains twelve of the posthumous works which he obtained from the Author ’ s family . The Heavenly Footman was not printed in that volume ; but Doe informs us that he purchased the copy from Bunyan ’ s eldest son , John , in the year 1691 . He afterwards published it , with the life , list , &c . , in the year 1698 .
